hero.intro: Forgot what you choice for food or who to bring as your plus one? We've got you.
hero.paragraph: This is your page. Here you'll find your RSVP and maybe other info that's only for you. Let us know if anything is missing. Haven't RSVP'd yet? Please, do so.

body.heading: My information
body.intro: This is the information we have about you. Do you want to tell us something new?
